string.text:
A well-worn guide containing essential survival strategies and crafting techniques tailored for life in the Zone. It covers everything from basic shelter construction to improvised tools and supplies.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recipe

A detailed manual focused on repairing and modifying weapons, armor, and machinery using scavenged parts. Stalkers skilled in mechanics rely on it to keep their gear functional in the harsh Zone environment.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recipe

A technical handbook outlining advanced troubleshooting and crafting methods for creating and enhancing equipment, including electronic modifications. Only the most resourceful stalkers can fully utilize its complex schematics.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recipe

A couple of pages torn from a book, handwritten in smudged blue ink. The written notes describe the creation of various types of drugs and medicines using common medical supplies.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recipe

A practical guide on safely assembling and modifying ammunition using salvaged gunpowder and casings. Essential for any stalker who wants to craft reliable rounds without risking a catastrophic misfire.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recipe

A collection of handwritten recipes detailing how to prepare edible meals from the scarce and often questionable resources found in the Zone. A valuable find for any stalker tired of stale rations and mutant meat with questionable safety.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recipe

An old, faded notebook slipped into a card sleeve to protect it from wear and tear. Unfortunately, it didn't withstand the passage of time and is now heavily water damaged.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

An old, faded notebook slipped into a card sleeve to protect it from wear and tear. Unfortunately, it didn't withstand the passage of time and is now heavily water damaged.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

An instructional leaflet stamped with the Freedom emblem outlining fundamental methods of extracting information through psychological and physical means. Whether intended for self-defense or darker purposes, its presence raises unsettling questions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

An instructional leaflet stamped with the Freedom emblem outlining fundamental methods of extracting information through psychological and physical means. Whether intended for self-defense or darker purposes, its presence raises unsettling questions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A handful of aged, handwritten pages detailing the experiences of an unknown stalker, filled with personal reflections, survival tips, and fragmented memories. Though incomplete, they provide a haunting glimpse into the trials and tragedies of life in the Zone.\n \n

A handful of aged, handwritten pages detailing the experiences of an unknown stalker, filled with personal reflections, survival tips, and fragmented memories. Though incomplete, they provide a haunting glimpse into the trials and tragedies of life in the Zone.\n \n
Walking Dead Findings Field Report 39B rev. 2 (Part 1 of 3)

A classified machine-typed document stamped with the Ecologist research emblem detailing observations and theories regarding the so-called "Walking Dead" phenomenon in the Zone. Signed by Arkady Cvetkovsky, it contains unsettling accounts of zombified stalkers, potential causes, and the dangers of prolonged exposure to anomalous radiation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Walking Dead Findings Field Report 39B rev. 2 (Part 2 of 3)

A classified machine-typed document stamped with the Ecologist research emblem detailing observations and theories regarding the so-called "Walking Dead" phenomenon in the Zone. Signed by Arkady Cvetkovsky, it contains unsettling accounts of zombified stalkers, potential causes, and the dangers of prolonged exposure to anomalous radiation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Walking Dead Findings Field Report 39B rev. 2 (part 3 of 3)

A classified machine-typed document stamped with the Ecologist research emblem detailing observations and theories regarding the so-called "Walking Dead" phenomenon in the Zone. Signed by Arkady Cvetkovsky, it contains unsettling accounts of zombified stalkers, potential causes, and the dangers of prolonged exposure to anomalous radiation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A handwritten prayer dedicated to the Monolith, filled with fervent devotion and cryptic references to its supposed divine will. The text suggests an almost fanatical belief, offering insight into the cult-like mindset of Monolith followers.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A handwritten prayer dedicated to the Monolith, filled with fervent devotion and cryptic references to its supposed divine will. The text suggests an almost fanatical belief, offering insight into the cult-like mindset of Monolith followers.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A handwritten prayer dedicated to the Monolith, filled with fervent devotion and cryptic references to its supposed divine will. The text suggests an almost fanatical belief, offering insight into the cult-like mindset of Monolith followers.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

An untidy and chaotically hand-written note belonging to a Monolith zealot, containing fragmented thoughts, mission logs, and obsessive praise for the mysterious entity.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A letter written to someone outside the Zone, most probably their lover. It looks to have unfortunately never reached its intended recipient.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A note found in a stash. Looks like someone was killing time during a long and boring night.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A handwritten note from one of the Mercenaries containing thoughts concerning his activities in the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A printed transcription of a radio transmission between military units stationed in the Zone. Most probably apart of some clandestine operation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A hand-written letter addressed to Nikolai.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
